message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the product for $9,500. I believe it will be highly beneficial to you and this is a fair price.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,200. I'm interested in the product, but I'm on a tight budget.
Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $8,200 is too low for me.  How about we meet in the middle at $8,800?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,500. I'm really interested in the product and I'm willing to pay a premium, but I'm still on a tight budget.
